import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" function Detail(props){ let {id} = useParams(); let itemId = props.shoes.find(function(x){ return x.id==id }) return(

{itemId.title}

{itemId.content}

{itemId.price}원

COLOR

SIZE

{'>'} DETAIL

{'>'} SIZE & FIT

{'>'} SHIPPING & RETURNS

//여따가recommended
//여따가 Ai Pick
//여따가 상품리뷰
) } export default Detail
